rules.description: Left alt + spacebar -> Left command + spacebar
Ctrl+C, Ctrl+V, Ctrl+X => Cmd+C (Copy), Cmd+V (Paste), Cmd+X (Cut)
Ctrl + BS/Del Keys to Option + BS/Del Keys
Shift+End => Cmd+Shift+Right arrow (Move cursor to end of line with selection)
Shift+Home => Cmd+Shift+Left arrow (Move cursor to beginning of line with selection)
End => Cmd+Right arrow (Move cursor to end of line)
Home => Cmd+Left arrow (Move cursor to beginning of line)
Ctrl + BS/Del Keys to Option + BS/Del Keys
(Added for Terminal) Ctrl+Shift+C, Ctrl+Shift+V => Cmd+C (Copy), Cmd+V (Paste)
option+e - open Finder (similar to windows+e opene windows explorer)
Map Rectangular Screenshot (copy to clipboard) to Ctrl+Shift+s
Disable command+q app quitting - remap to left_option-q so you can still use it in Rider for closing all other tabs)
Option + '.' (period) to pop-up the emoji menu (command + control + space)
Open a terminal window with Ctrl-RAlt-T
Open a terminal window with Ctrl-LAlt-T
Open a terminal window with Ctrl-RAlt-T
Ctrl + Shift + Arrow Keys to Option + Shift + Arrow Keys
Ctrl+C, Ctrl+V, Ctrl+X => Cmd+C (Copy), Cmd+V (Paste), Cmd+X (Cut)
Ctrl+L => Cmd+L (Open url location) (Only in browsers)
Ctrl+(Shift)+Right/left arrow => Alt+(Shift)+Right/left arrow (Move cursor one word with selection and without selection)
Ctrl+Up/down arrow => Up/down arrow (Move cursor up/down)
Ctrl+Left Click => Cmd+Left Click (select multiple items)
